amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to the investigation and recovery of missing weapons and military equipment provided to the Government of Yemen by the United States Government.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1073 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1073 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Lee. (consideration: CR 3/26/2015 S2014-2022; text as modified: CR 3/26/2015 S2018) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to the investigation and recovery of missing weapons and military equipment provided to the Government of Yemen by the United States Government.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1073 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1073 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Lee.
